main event: A sighting of a round object that changed color from red to blue-white was reported in Climax, Colorado on June 30, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a dime with a trail like a meteor,The observation lasted for 2 seconds,The sighting was categorized as likely being a meteor,The witness claimed that the object was seen at a 45-degree elevation and moving west,There were no significant details regarding the object other than its color change and trail.
